hostel_name: Aparthotel Adagio Access Marseille Prado Périer
hostel_alt_img: Aparthotel Adagio Access Marseille Prado Périer
description: A fully-equipped kitchen equipped with hotplates is a standard facility in the accommodation at Aparthotel Adagio Access Marseille Prado Périer. All studios and apartments have an LCD TV and some have a separate bedroom.
The air-conditioned guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV, desk and a private bathroom with a bath.
Breakfast is available in the mornings and can be enjoyed on the terrace.

The studios and apartments at Apart’hotel Marseille Prado Chanot feature air conditioning, an equipped kitchenette with microwave and dishwasher, and satellite TV.  Some rooms have a balcony with garden view.

hostel_name: Aparthotel Adagio Access Marseille Saint Charles
hostel_alt_img: Aparthotel Adagio Access Marseille Saint Charles
description: The modern air-conditioned studios and apartments have free WiFi and are serviced by a lift. The fully equipped kitchen or kitchenette features a microwave and a refrigerator.
Guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a wardrobe. All guest rooms include a safety deposit box.
Each soundproofed guest room at L’Eau Des Collines is equipped with a TV with satellite channels. The modern bathrooms include bathroom amenities.
Each individually decorated room also features a mini refrigerator and a flat-screen TV with a selection of free films. All rooms have a private bathroom with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries.
Rooms at the Mercure Marseille Centre are equipped with satellite and cable TV and a radio. Each room has a private bathroom with a hairdryer.
The studios and apartments have a flat-screen satellite TV and a kitchenette with a microwave and stovetop. The private bathroom has a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided.

Studios and apartments at Residhome Marseille Saint-Charles are serviced by a lift and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with bathtub. Some are suitable for guests with reduced mobility.
The light and airy guest rooms are spacious with designer furnishings and have a private bathroom.
Each spacious apartment has a kitchenette, a seating area and a flat-screen TV. Bed linen and towels are included.

Featuring a cocktail bar, garden and a fitness centre on the 6th floor, NH Collection Marseille is located in the new business and leisure district of Marseille, La Joliette. Located between the port and the city centre, the building was inaugurated by Napoleon III in 1864 and preserves its original style.

hostel_name: InterContinental Marseille - Hotel Dieu, an IHG Hotel
hostel_alt_img: InterContinental Marseille - Hotel Dieu, an IHG Hotel
description: With 194 rooms and suites, some with landmark views and private terraces, the hotel features contemporary, elegant decor, complementing its historical features.
Located in the centre of Marseille, Les Appartements du Vieux Port is 150 m from the Old Port. The apartments offer free WiFi and a modern-style décor.

An LCD TV and air conditioning feature in all of the contemporary studios and suites. All accommodation at Aparthotel Adagio Marseille Timone has lift access and internet access, and the suites have a seating area, a safe and flat-screen TV. The kitchens are equipped with a stovetop, microwave, dishwasher and kitchenware.

Boasting a spacious terrace, a boules pitch and a concept store, the Hotel Montgrand House - Old Port with its 49 rooms and 13 apartments is located in the centre of Marseille, just 5 minutes' walk from the Old Port and 4 km from the Vélodrome stadium.

hostel_name: Grand Hotel Beauvau Marseille Vieux Port - MGallery
hostel_alt_img: Grand Hotel Beauvau Marseille Vieux Port - MGallery
description: Decorated with Empire or Napoleon III furniture, rooms and suites at Grand Hotel Beauvau Marseille Vieux Port - MGallery are air-conditioned and offer satellite and cable TV. The private bathrooms feature a bath and shower, large mirror, hairdryer, bathrobes, slippers and toiletries.

All apartments and studios are accessible via a lift and feature a flat-screen TV. Each unit has a kitchenette fitted with a dishwasher, microwave, toaster, fridge, stovetop, coffee machine and kettle. There is a private bathroom with free toiletries in each unit. Towels and bed linen are offered.
All of the units feature a private bathroom, flat-screen TV and fully-equipped kitchenette.

Rooms feature air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath or shower, free toiletries and hairdryer. The suites have a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Access to the upper floors and rooms is secure and by magnetic access card only.

hostel_name: Holiday Inn Express Marseille Saint Charles, an IHG Hotel
hostel_alt_img: Holiday Inn Express Marseille Saint Charles, an IHG Hotel
description: Rooms at Holiday Inn Express Marseille Saint Charles are soundproofed and feature a modern décor. Each is air-conditioned and equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.
Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and has a flat-screen TV. All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom fitted with a bath or shower. Extras include free toiletries and a hairdryer.
Rooms at Ibis Marseille Centre Prefecturecan be accessed by an elevator and are equipped with a satellite TV, desk and wardrobe. Rooms have an en suite bathroom with a shower and toilet.

hostel_name: MEININGER Hotel Paris Porte de Vincennes
hostel_alt_img: MEININGER Hotel Paris Porte de Vincennes
description: Guest rooms at the hotel are equipped with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and a shower. At MEININGER Hotel Paris Porte de Vincennes each room includes bed linen and towels.
Guest rooms at Ascot Opera are decorated in a classic French style and some feature wooden floors and exposed beams. They are each equipped with satellite TV, a safety deposit box and a minibar.
All soundproofed guest rooms feature a minibar and a refined décor. Some have views over the park or the Eiffel Tower. Private bathrooms include a bath or shower, towel dryer and hairdryer.
Recently renovated, all guest rooms are soundproofed and fitted with bathroom, satellite television, telephone, Internet access and, for some of them, balcony.
Each guest room has a TV with Canal+ satellite channels.

hostel_name: Tonic Hotel Saint Germain des Prés
hostel_alt_img: Tonic Hotel Saint Germain des Prés
description: The guest rooms at Tonic Hotel Saint Germain des Près include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. They offer a city view and a private bathroom with bathrobes, a hairdryer and free toiletries.

Decorated in a contemporary style, the bright guest rooms offer panoramic views of Paris. They includes a flat-screen TV with free access to the latest films, an iPod dock and free WiFi access. Most of the rooms have a balcony, while some also have a stunning view of the Eiffel Tower or the garden.
The guest rooms at Hôtel Océanic include a TV with Canal + channels. They each have a private bathroom with a bathtub, free toiletries and a hairdryer.
The air-conditioned guest rooms are equipped with a minibar and an LCD TV with satellite channels. Each room at the Left Bank has a classic décor and free Wi-Fi access.
Situated in an elegant Haussman building, Millenium hotel is just 500 m from Opéra Garnier and the famous Galeries Lafayette.  It offers soundproofed accommodation and a glass-domed French brasserie.

Located in the heart of Paris, Résidence Charles Floquet is 50 m from the Eiffel Tower and a 20-minute walk from the Army Museum. Set in a renovated, historic building, it offers large, self-catering accommodation with views over the Eiffel Tower.
Each room is equipped with an LCD TV with satellite channels, a desk, a safety box and tea and coffee making facilities. The private bathrooms feature a bathtub and a hairdryer.
Each room is equipped with a TV with satellite channels. All of the bright rooms have a private bathroom fitted with a hairdryer.
All rooms feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a wardrobe. The en suite bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries.
Each room at Beaugrenelle Saint-Charles is equipped with satellite TV.  All rooms are soundproofed and serviced by an elevator.

hostel_name: Courtyard by Marriott Paris Gare de Lyon
hostel_alt_img: Courtyard by Marriott Paris Gare de Lyon
description: All units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Featuring a private bathroom, rooms at Courtyard Paris Gare de Lyon also boast free WiFi in public areas and free WiFi in the guest rooms for Marriott members. All rooms at the accommodation have air conditioning and a wardrobe.
At the hotel, rooms come with a desk. The rooms are equipped with a safety deposit box, while some rooms also feature a balcony. All guest rooms feature a wardrobe.
Some rooms include a seating area to relax in after a busy day. The Hoxton, Paris features free WiFi throughout the property. A TV is featured.

Well set in the centre of Paris, Chouchou Hotel provides air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. This property is located a short distance from attractions such as Musée de l'Orangerie, La Cigale Concert Hall, and Tuileries Garden. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests.
The units in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. At Hôtel Madame Rêve, all rooms come with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV  the prperty offers free wi-fi .

Each room includes a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is available daily with a supplement, and it can be served in the comfort of your room.
Rooms at Le Petit Cosy Hôtel feature a modern decoration. All rooms have a private bathroom or views of the interior courtyard.

hostel_name: Crowne Plaza Paris République, an IHG Hotel
hostel_alt_img: Crowne Plaza Paris République, an IHG Hotel
description: Guestrooms are spacious and contemporary in style. All rooms and suites are equipped with modern bathrooms and include a flat-screen TV.

Each room is fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, a minibar as well as a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Guests can enjoy the panoramic views over Montparnasse district. Room service is available 24/7.
The air-conditioned studios and apartments at this property are serviced by a lift and include satellite TV. Bed linen is supplied. A private bathroom with a bath and a hairdryer is also provided.
